A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
As a huge Star Wars fan and lover of The Force Awakens\, I did come out slightly disappointed.  Not to say this wasn't a great film but expectations were not met. 

The Force Awakens set up some amazing mystery's and anticipation but 2 years later and we just don't get the satisfaction.

Confusing motives of the main bad guy didn't help.  This felt like a reach too far and a franchise that may have reached its limit.   Part 3 will now have to rely on the the new characters only but are they strong enough....
